column4: Can someone please tell me about Ubiquity? If i install Ubuntu with Ubiquity on my HDD (from a livecd), will it come with a boot manager?

No I doubt it does. Thing is I'm going to install nubuntu livecd onto my Hard drive with the Ubiquity program. I want to make sure I can select which partition to install along with a boot manager so i dont loose and can still boot into Windows XP
i suppose you could either use the windows boot manager or you could use grub
